name: Washing Panic
description:
My son is interested in learning how to develop games. Using Gamemaker 1.4 we made this game. My son did all the art work and we downloaded the sounds from some assest packs found on itch.io.

The game is basic however was a great jumping in point for learning about how to make objects interact with each other and how rooms work in GML.

We developed this game for the Mini Game Jam 38. The theme being food and the limitations being arrow keys only. 

Thanks to Frelon-K and Jalastram for the audio, with the time restrictions for the Jam we would not have had time to do the audio.

The background music was thanks to Frelon-K:
https://frelon-k-games.itch.io/
https://frelon-k-games.itch.io/free-chiptune-pack-no2

The sound effects were thanks to Jalastram:
https://jalastram.itch.io/retro-game-sounds-volume-1
